TopicTitle: Rover Mod, anything good out there for .90?

Articles.Content:
Bobcat had great rovers, but they're all dead, right?

Any other mods that go beyond stock and enable the kerbals to work in a short sleeve environment as they wander hither and yonder?

Kerbal Foundries have cool rover wheels.

They also have gravity repulsors!!
I'm not looking for cool rover wheels, though admittedly those are cool, but full fleshed Rover mods.
I think Roverdude has some in his MKS section.

You should look into ASET PRC and Exploration.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94947-Exploration-Rover-System-by-A-S-E-T-%2810-10-14%29

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86343-New-project-from-ASET
This affair about add-ons has been moved to Add-on Affairs.
